# Macros

## Mutex {#three_Mutex}

```C
Mutex(T) Mutex_$T
```

A parametrized mutex type

## MutexGuard {#three_MutexGuard}

```C
MutexGuard(T) MutexGuard_$T
```

A parametrized mutex guard type
